name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Jay Orel CRANDALL, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Jay Orel CRANDALL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Stephen H. Serota, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Christine 0. Boyd, Asst. Dist. Atty., John J. Kevlock, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
426 A.2d 107
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Jay Orel CRANDALL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 24, 1980.
Decided March 13, 1981.
Stephen H. Serota, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Christine 0. Boyd, Asst. Dist. Atty., John J. Kevlock, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
